# Speechreader's Sight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Medium Spells|Medium 1]], [[1st Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 1]], [[0 Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 1]], [[1st Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Spiritualist Spells|Spiritualist 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of the High Court, pg. 10

If a creature within 100 feet that you can see is speaking a language you understand, you can read its lips with perfect accuracy. Reading lips in this manner gives the exact wording of conversation and does not assist in deciphering any obfuscated ideas such as secret messages or slang. Reading lips requires moderate concentration, and you take a –4 penalty on other [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks while doing so.

*Speechreader’s sight* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell cast by a caster of 9th level or higher, at a cost of 2,500 gp.
